mapper.select: select count(*) from furniture_scrap where fur_no = #{fur_no}
select fur_scrap_no, fur_no, fur_scrap_date from furniture_scrap where mem_id = #{mem_id}
select fur_no, fur_name, fur_price, fur_good_num, fur_repl_num, fur_brand_name from FURNITURE, FURNITURE_BRAND where FURNITURE.FUR_BRAND_NO = FURNITURE_BRAND.FUR_BRAND_NO
select fur_pic_loc from furniture_picture where fur_no = #{fur_no}

select FUR_KIND_DEF_NAME from FURNITURE_KIND FK, FURNITURE_KIND_DEFINE FKD where FK.FUR_KIND_DEF_NO = FKD.FUR_KIND_DEF_NO and FK.FUR_NO = #{fur_no}
mapper.update: update furniture set fur_good_num = fur_good_num+1 where fur_no = #{fur_no}

update furniture set fur_repl_num = fur_repl_num-1 where fur_no = #{fur_no}
mapper.select: select fur_pic_loc from furniture_picture where fur_no = #{fur_no} and rownum=1
